entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 2:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Wind: NNE 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
